script:
echo syui:root | chpasswd
	 mkdir -p /boot/efi
	 mount /dev/${x}1 /boot/efi
	 archg=EFI/arch/grubx64.efi
	 osxg=System/Library/CoreServices
	 icns=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/syui/arch/master/icon/archlinux.volumeicon.icns
	 grub-install --target=x86_64-efi --efi-directory=/boot/efi --recheck
	 mkdir -p /boot/efi/$osxg
	 cp /boot/efi/$archg /boot/efi/$osxg/Boot.efi
	 curl -sL $icns -o /boot/efi/.volumeicon.icns
	 su syui -c 'curl -sL git.io/syu | zsh'
	 su syui -s /bin/zsh -c 'source ~/.zshrc && source ~/dotfile/.zsh/plugin/install.zsh/install.linux.zsh'
	 echo -e 'default_user syui
auto_login yes
daemon yes' >> /etc/slim.conf
	 systemctl enable slim
	 systemctl enable bluetooth
	 chsh -s /bin/zsh
	 chsh -s /bin/zsh syui
	 sed -i 's/timeout=5/timeout=0/g' /boot/grub/grub.cfg
	 git clone https://github.com/syui/numix-icon-theme /usr/share/icons/Numix-Dark
	 git clone https://github.com/numixproject/numix-icon-theme /usr/share/icons/numix-icon-theme
	 cp -rf /home/syui/dotfiles/etc/fonts/conf.avail/71-no-embedded-bitmaps.conf /etc/fonts/conf.d
	 cp -rf /usr/share/icons/numix-icon-theme/Numix /usr/share/icons/Numix
	 rm -rf /usr/share/icons/Adwaita
	 cp -rf /usr/share/icons/numix-icon-theme/Numix /usr/share/icons/Adwaita
	 cp -rf /home/syui/dotfiles/etc/vconsole.conf /etc/vconsole.conf
	 cp -rf /home/syui/dotfiles/etc/X11/xorg.conf.d/*.conf /etc/X11/xorg.conf.d/
	 curl -sL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/syui/arch/master/bin/icon.sh | zsh
	 locale-gen
	 echo 'pacman -S nmap wireshark-cli aircrack-ng arp-scan tor p7zip handbrake handbrake-cli inkscape clamav sysstat dstat iotop archlinux-themes-slim slim-themes gauche awesome vicious dwb xvkbd firefox libotf qiv xsel htop powertop krita arandr gvfs networkmanager' >> install.txt
	 echo 'yaourt -S broadcom-wl-dkms go-mtpfs-git dropbox iptraf-ng wireshark-cli proxychains-ng' >> install.txt
